thread.title: Liverpool's Philippe Coutinho reveals new Mickey Mouse tattoo
thread.title_full: Liverpool's Philippe Coutinho reveals new Mickey Mouse tattoo

author: Chris Wright
title: Liverpool's Philippe Coutinho reveals new Mickey Mouse tattoo
text:
15 hours ago Liverpool's Philippe Coutinho reveals new Mickey Mouse tattoo 
It would appear that Alberto Moreno isn't the only Liverpool player with a questionable animal tattoo ( several, in fact! ) about his person. 
At one point during the Reds' midweek training session, Philippe Coutinho bared his midriff and duly displayed a brand new, somewhat perplexing addition to his collection of body art. Presented without comment... pic.twitter.com/hqyGTEd22l - Who Ate All The Pies (@waatpies) March 16, 2017 
Yes, you are seeing that correctly -- it is indeed Disney stalwart Mickey Mouse, needled indelibly onto a 24-year-old man's torso. 
Feel free to add your own 'Mickey Mouse outfit' punchlines at this juncture. 
Chris covers the funny side of the game for ESPN FC in the Toe Poke blog.
